mapper.select: SELECT a.id, supervisor_no AS supervisorNo, supervisor_name AS supervisorName, case sex when '0' then '男' when '1' then '女' end as sex, belong_college AS belongCollege FROM sys_supervisor a INNER JOIN sys_user b ON a.user_id = b.id WHERE b.id = #{id}
SELECT result_id AS resultId, result_type AS resultType From result_list a INNER JOIN sys_supervisor b ON a.supervisor_id = b.id
